subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball (College)
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: It’s easy to say Bear Bryant’s tactics in 1954 would be universally unaccepted today. Then we see how the Rutgers coach firing played out.
snippet: It’s easy to say Bear Bryant’s tactics in 1954 would be universally unaccepted today. Then we see how the Rutgers coach firing played out.
